CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 27, 1962, page 16, reads: "Plan "Rights" Day - The United Nations Association of Pittsburgh, an affiliate of the American Association for the United Nations, is planning to observe Human Rights Day on Wednesday, Feb. 21, at noon, at Hotel Webster Hall, where Lady Chesham of Tanganyika will be guest speaker. The planning committee members are, left to right: Mrs. David Labowitz, Mrs. Mary White and Mrs. Robert M. Brown. - Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Human Rights Day planning committee members, from left: Mrs. David Labowitz, Mary White, and Mrs. Robert M. Brown, posed behind table with display of international flags in interior with bookshelves including one titles "Agenda for Action", vertical version
